verses.roman:
viśeṣe rājāra ājñā hañāche āmāre
prabhura ājñā yei, sei śīghra karibāre

synonyms: viśeṣe—specifically; rājāra—of the King; ājñā—order; hañāche—there is; āmāre—upon me; prabhura—of Your Lordship; ājñā—order; yei—whatever; sei—that; śīghra karibāre—to execute without delay.
translation: "The King gave a special order for me to do without delay whatever Your Lordship orders.
